items.sentence: Tom is never going to have to do that, is he?
Maybe you and I could do that together later.
It's not going to be easy for you to do that.
I think it would be pretty stupid to do that.
I don't see any reason why we should do that.
I don't think that I'm capable of doing that.
I wonder what I'll do if Tom doesn't do that.
I took it for granted that Tom would do that.
Why is Tom having so much trouble doing that?
I really want to do that, if at all possible.
